#summary DataFilter syntax

= Introduction =

Parameters for an data filter field (DataFilter).


= Details =

Filling the array will tell Rapyd how to display a filtered table (DataGrid).

_Syntax_

{{{
$config = array	(
    'label'   => '<img name="min_max" src="assets/maximize.gif" align="texttop" /> Filter',
    'fields'  => array(
        array(
          'type'  => 'input',
          'name'  => 'name',
          'label' => 'Name',
          'style' => 'width:170px',
        ),
        array(
          'type'   => 'dropdown',
          'name'   => 'status',
          'label'  => 'Status',
          'option' => '',
          'options'=> 'SELECT status_id, status FROM status',
          'style' => 'width:174px',
        ),

    ),
    'buttons' => array('reset','search')
  );
}}}

*label* a label to display above the search field (may contain HTML/javascript code)

*fields* the database field(s) to use. These can contain references to other tables by including an SQL statement. The syntax example will produce HTML like:
{{{
<option value="status_id">status</option>
}}}
where status_id and status are derived from the database.

*buttons* the buttons to display at the bottom of the form:
  * reset: reset the form
  * search: perform the search
